languages.text: "И каждый раз, когда я была на пороге смерти, он забирал частицу моей души и творил... это!" {n}Кибелла указывает на двойников.{/n} "Нечестивые подобия! Моя душа изувечена, а я — насмешка над тем, кем была. И я больше... не могу биться".

"And every time I found myself upon death's threshold, he claimed a part of my soul to create... this!" {n}Kibellah gestures to her copies.{/n} "Unhallowed replicas! My soul is mutilated, and I am a mockery of what I once was. And I... can't fight. Not anymore."
languages.original_text: "И каждый раз, когда я была на пороге смерти, он забирал частицу моей души и творил... это!" {n}Кибелла указывает на двойников.{/n} "Нечестивые подобия! Моя душа изувечена, а я — насмешка над тем, кем была. И я больше... не могу биться".

traits.locale_text: "And every time I found myself upon death's threshold, he claimed a part of my soul to create... this!" {n}Kibellah gestures to her copies.{/n} "Unhallowed replicas! My soul is mutilated, and I am a mockery of what I once was. And I... can't fight. Not anymore."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

traits.locale_text: {n}As soon as her shouts die down, another whispers in a hollow voice,{/n} "The blasphemer said you were dead. This worthless blade broke itself against the bones of its enemies to wash away the shame. But then the blade awakened here among others like it. And kept on killing." {n}A vacant smile touches her lips.{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

traits.locale_text: "And every time I found myself upon death's threshold, he claimed a part of my soul to create... this!" {n}Kibellah gestures to her copies.{/n} "Unhallowed replicas! My soul is mutilated, and I am a mockery of what I once was. And I... can't fight. Not anymore."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

traits.locale_text: "And every time I found myself upon death's threshold, he claimed a part of my soul to create... this!" {n}Kibellah gestures to her copies.{/n} "Unhallowed replicas! My soul is mutilated, and I am a mockery of what I once was. And I... can't fight. Not anymore."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

traits.locale_text: "And every time I found myself upon death's threshold, he claimed a part of my soul to create... this!" {n}Kibellah gestures to her copies.{/n} "Unhallowed replicas! My soul is mutilated, and I am a mockery of what I once was. And I... can't fight. Not anymore."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: «Y cada vez que me encontraba en el umbral de la muerte, extrajo una parte de mi alma para crear... ¡esto!». {n}Kibellah señala a sus copias.{/n} «¡Réplicas impías! Mi alma está mutilada; soy una pantomima de lo que era. Y soy... incapaz de luchar. No puedo más».
languages.original_text: "And every time I found myself upon death's threshold, he claimed a part of my soul to create... this!" {n}Kibellah gestures to her copies.{/n} "Unhallowed replicas! My soul is mutilated, and I am a mockery of what I once was. And I... can't fight. Not anymore."

traits.locale_text: «Y cada vez que me encontraba en el umbral de la muerte, extrajo una parte de mi alma para crear... ¡esto!». {n}Kibellah señala a sus copias.{/n} «¡Réplicas impías! Mi alma está mutilada; soy una pantomima de lo que era. Y soy... incapaz de luchar. No puedo más».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: 「そして、我が死の淵に立つたびに奴は我の魂の一部を要求し、作り出したのです…これを！」{n}キベラは自分のクローンを手で示す。{/n}「アンハローの複製体を！我が魂は切り刻まれ、我はかつての自分自身を愚弄する存在となりました。それに我は…戦えません。もうこれ以上は」
languages.original_text: "And every time I found myself upon death's threshold, he claimed a part of my soul to create... this!" {n}Kibellah gestures to her copies.{/n} "Unhallowed replicas! My soul is mutilated, and I am a mockery of what I once was. And I... can't fight. Not anymore."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、我が死の淵に立つたびに奴は我の魂の一部を要求し、作り出したのです…これを！」{n}キベラは自分のクローンを手で示す。{/n}「アンハローの複製体を！我が魂は切り刻まれ、我はかつての自分自身を愚弄する存在となりました。それに我は…戦えません。もうこれ以上は」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: “每当我濒临死亡时，他都会取走我的一部分灵魂，创造出了……这些东西！”{n}绮贝菈向另外两个一模一样的人做了个手势。{/n}“这些邪恶的复制人！我的灵魂已经残缺不全，我不再是曾经的我。我已经……无法战斗了，再也无法战斗了。”
languages.original_text: "And every time I found myself upon death's threshold, he claimed a part of my soul to create... this!" {n}Kibellah gestures to her copies.{/n} "Unhallowed replicas! My soul is mutilated, and I am a mockery of what I once was. And I... can't fight. Not anymore."

traits.locale_text: “每当我濒临死亡时，他都会取走我的一部分灵魂，创造出了……这些东西！”{n}绮贝菈向另外两个一模一样的人做了个手势。{/n}“这些邪恶的复制人！我的灵魂已经残缺不全，我不再是曾经的我。我已经……无法战斗了，再也无法战斗了。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: "Und jedes Mal, wenn ich an der Schwelle des Todes stand, nahm er sich einen Teil meiner Seele und erschuf ... das hier!" {n}Kibellah deutet auf ihre Kopien.{/n} "Unheilige Repliken! Meine Seele ist verstümmelt und ich bin nur noch ein Hohn meiner selbst. Und ich ... kann nicht kämpfen. Nicht mehr."
languages.original_text: "And every time I found myself upon death's threshold, he claimed a part of my soul to create... this!" {n}Kibellah gestures to her copies.{/n} "Unhallowed replicas! My soul is mutilated, and I am a mockery of what I once was. And I... can't fight. Not anymore."

traits.locale_text: "Und jedes Mal, wenn ich an der Schwelle des Todes stand, nahm er sich einen Teil meiner Seele und erschuf ... das hier!" {n}Kibellah deutet auf ihre Kopien.{/n} "Unheilige Repliken! Meine Seele ist verstümmelt und ich bin nur noch ein Hohn meiner selbst. Und ich ... kann nicht kämpfen. Nicht mehr."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: « Et chaque fois que je me suis retrouvée au seuil de la mort, il m'a arraché une partie de mon âme pour créer... ça ! » {n}Kibellah désigne ses sosies.{/n} « De méprisables copies ! Mon âme est mutilée, et je ne suis plus que l'ombre de ce que j'étais autrefois. Pire encore... je ne suis pas fichue de me battre. Plus maintenant. »
languages.original_text: "And every time I found myself upon death's threshold, he claimed a part of my soul to create... this!" {n}Kibellah gestures to her copies.{/n} "Unhallowed replicas! My soul is mutilated, and I am a mockery of what I once was. And I... can't fight. Not anymore."

traits.locale_text: « Et chaque fois que je me suis retrouvée au seuil de la mort, il m'a arraché une partie de mon âme pour créer... ça ! » {n}Kibellah désigne ses sosies.{/n} « De méprisables copies ! Mon âme est mutilée, et je ne suis plus que l'ombre de ce que j'étais autrefois. Pire encore... je ne suis pas fichue de me battre. Plus maintenant. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: "Kendimi ölümün eşiğinde bulduğum her seferde ruhumun bir parçasını alarak... Bunu yarattı!" {n}Kibellah, kopyalarını işaret ediyor.{/n} "Menhus replikalar! Ruhum sakat bırakıldı ve artık eskiden olduğum şeyin komik bir taklidiyim. Ben artık... Savaşamıyorum. "
languages.original_text: "And every time I found myself upon death's threshold, he claimed a part of my soul to create... this!" {n}Kibellah gestures to her copies.{/n} "Unhallowed replicas! My soul is mutilated, and I am a mockery of what I once was. And I... can't fight. Not anymore."
